title: RIP RBG, Dew Garitas Tho? 9.22.20
itunes:title: RIP RBG, Dew Garitas Tho? 9.22.20
description:
In episode 720, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Bechdel Cast co-host Caitlin Durante to discuss the aftermath of Ruth Bader Ginsburg's death, protest songs, Ellen's comeback, the Dew Garita, Taco Bell wine, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. For Women, the Death of Ruth Bader Ginsburg Brings a Particular Grief
  2. Amid the Outpouring for Ginsburg, a Hint of Backlash
  3. Fox’s Tammy Bruce says a quick confirmation of a new Supreme Court justice is how to “really honor Ruth Bader Ginsburg’s legacy”
  4. Tucker Carlson: “I'm going to choose not to believe” Ruth Bader Ginsburg's dying wish to not be replaced by Trump
  5. Trump Suggests RBG’s Dying Wish to Not Be Replaced Until After Election Was Written by Adam Schiff or Nancy Pelosi
  6. “Let’s go for it.” Right-wing media immediately urge SCOTUS appointment during election
  7. The tortured logic from right-wing media about replacing Ruth Bader Ginsburg
  8. In Context: The 'Biden Rule' on Supreme Court nominations in an election year
  9. Van Morrison to release lockdown protest songs
  10. Ellen DeGeneres addresses toxic workplace allegations in season premiere
  11. Mountain Dew creates first cocktail for Red Lobster, the 'Dew Garita.' Here's when you can try the tequila drink.
  12. Red Lobster Really Wants to Be a Fancy Restaurant
  13. Taco Bell is now selling its own custom wine
  14. Twilight Virtual Reading: The Bechdel Cast X Fatima for CA State Assembly! Tickets here!
  15. WATCH: Satin PSICODELIC - Sunni Colón

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
